caption.center: In the Matter of the Marriage of McCUNE, Respondent — Cross-Appellant, and

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court, Marion County, Clarke C. Brown, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Malcolm J. Corrigall, Coos Bay, argued the cause for appellant — cross-respondent. With him on the brief was Ormsbee Corrigall, Coos Bay.
M. Chapin Milbank, Salem, argued the cause and filed the brief for respondent — cross-appellant.
opinion.panel: Before Buttler, Presiding Judge, and Joseph, Chief Judge, and Warren, Judge.
opinion.opinion_text:
PER CURIAM
Judgment modified to award wife $500 permanent spousal support; provision requiring husband to maintain health insurance for benefit of wife stricken; affirmed as modified. Costs to wife on appeal.Page 193

On de novo review, we conclude that wife is entitled to $500 per month permanent spousal support. See Vinson andVinson, 83 Or. App. 487, 732 P.2d 79, rev den 303 Or. 332 (1987).
On the cross-appeal, we agree with husband that the court erred in requiring, without any evidence of its cost, that he maintain health insurance benefits for wife.[fn1]
Judgment modified to award wife $500 permanent spousal support; provision requiring husband to maintain health insurance for benefit of wife stricken; affirmed as modified. Costs to wife on appeal.
[fn1] Husband does not challenge the provision insofar as it requires that he maintain insurance for the benefit of the minor children.Page 194
